name: Help Me Help Everyone, Even the Humans
name_original: Help Me Help Everyone, Even the Humans
description:
A.K.A. The Last Stand of Space Debris Team 0221

Earth faces its final day as an impossible barrage of asteroids, sent by a forever unknown malevolent force, rains  down upon its surface. The last robot space debris cleanup force, Space Debris Team 0221, lies in the direct path of the asteroid stream along with the last functional Outer Detritus Deflection Shield (ODDS). Knowing that this will be their last functional day, they begin laser operations...

This game was built as a submission for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1, following along with the theme of "Stronger Together." 

Credits for assets used:

"Absolute Space & Sci-Fi Music" Free Sample by Voltz Supreme
FREE Casual Game SFX Pack by Dustyroom
Free Space Ships by 1MAFX
Stylized Earth by Ryan Zehm
Starfield Skybox by PULSAR BYTES
Low Poly Space Rocks by David Stenfors
